content: If the bulls are heading for a meltdown or seem unlikely to actually compete this season, and unlikely to land a superstar next, then isn't the smart decision to trade butler for assets? I think the bulls desire to get back both Smart and Crowder was idiotic, but could the bulls possibly get both Brooklyn Picks and maybe Brown? That would be a great haul for the Bulls while that team in Boston would be very good and defensively probably the best in the league.
